response.original_title: My Three Ungrateful Brothers Come Crawling Back
response.overview: In My Three Ungrateful Brothers Come Crawling Back movie, Oriana's mom passed away when she was 6; her stepmother abandoned her at a trailer park. When she was 12, she saved the richest man on earth, Murray Morel, and was adopted as his granddaughter. 2 years later, her three brothers found her, and she decided to return to her biological family. In consideration of their egos, she hid her wealth from them but still secretly helped her brothers to succeed in school. However, the brothers are fooled by her evil stepsister and start to bully her. They kicked her out and almost beat her to death. After getting rescued by her adopted Grandfather, she finally sees the true colors of her brothers. She breaks up with them and plans to take everything back. The punished brothers eventually realize that Oriana is their real family and beg on their knees for her forgiveness.
response.title: My Three Ungrateful Brothers Come Crawling Back
